462
080-231b @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shi tsa tuHbI ThA khyA ta tan+t+ra rA jo man+t+ra aM sa nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gdan bzhi pa'i bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sngags kyi cha zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnal 'byor nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig la spyod pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/ /gsum pa

463
080-232a yi ni dang po'o/ /de yi sbyor ba rnyed nas ni/ /sngags kyi de bzhin khyad par nyid/ /snying po yi ni snying po'i chos/ /rab sbyor gsang zhing gsang ba yi/ /de nyid de nyid de las mchog /snying po'i de nyid bsdus pa'o/ /bla ma'i ma ning gnyis bzung la/ /rtsa bar bskor zhing mnan par bya/ /spyi bor 'od dang zla ba'o/ /sa bon bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin/ /zla ba dkar dang kun+da'i mdog /gtso bo'i sngon du sbyar bar bya/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa rdzogs bya zhing / /dbyangs yig mngon par mthong ba ni/ /las rnams gsum gyi sngon du ni/ /bla ma'i yi ge sngon du'o/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar po'o/ /bzhi pa dag pa ru ni brjod/ /myu gu'i gnas ni gtso bo nyid/ /sred pa mchog tu sgrol pa'o/ /dbyangs yig dbyangs kyi bsgom pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi mtshon par bya/ /don grub 'dod pas bzlas pa yi/ /ban+du ka yi me tog 'dra/ /rdo rje dbyug pa la rtag tu/ /de nyid du na rnam par thim/ /dkar bo zla bas mnan pa yi/ /gnyis ka bsgoms pas bkru bar bya/ /pad+ma rdo rje zla ba dang / /bdud rtsi yis ni bkru bar ldan/ /dang po'i sa bon gtso bo yis/ /dbyangs yi ge kun la khyab pa'o/ /dkar zhing dag la mnyam pa'i 'od/ /gsum pa'i las kyi sa bon ni/ /bzhi bar nam yang ma yin no/ /ji ltar dang po mthar gnas pa'i/ /khyad par dbyangs yig sa bon nyid/ /mtha' yi sngon du sa bon nyid/ /de bzhin sngon du nyis 'gyur ro/ /bzhi po mnyam pa'i cha ru ni/ /mnyam pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya/ /bzhi pa gsum pa'i sa bon ni/ /mgo smos go ba'i lus nyid do/ /yi ge gsum gyi lus nyid ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dbyangs yig dngos/ /lus dang lus sogs yi ge ni/ /lcags kyu yis ni mnan par bya/ /dmar dang gnag sogs sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/ /lnga ba drug pa'i sa bon ni/ /thams cad sgra yi yi ge'o/ /

464
080-232b dkar dang ser la lci bar bshad/ /dmar dang sngon po de bzhin yang / /zhi rgyas dbang la sogs pa ni/ /kun kyang sgra yid bye ba'o/ /thams cad las la sgra yis ni/ /kha dog bzhi ru rab tu grags/ /bdun pa brgyad pa'i sa bon gyis/ /skyes bu rang 'dod pa yi las/ /nges bar lus ni sngom pa dang / /gnyis pa'i sa bon gyis mnan pa'o/ /yang bas dmar dang gnag la sbyar/ /rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du/ /mtshams ni bcad cing mnan pa'i las/ /gnyis pa lcags kyu'i yi ge ni/ /rang bzhin yi ge ming gi ni/ /de nyid las rnams 'gugs pa dang / /sa bon 'di ni dbye ba'o/ /kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od/ /thams cad 'dres pa'i sa bon ni/ /dbyangs yig bskyed pa'i sa bon ni/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'o/ /ma ning gis bskyed sa bon ni/ /brtan zhing rtag pa'i sa bon no/ /bud med dang ni skyes pa'am/ /'di nyid kun nas rab tu sbyar/ /sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni/ /tha ma bzhi ni rnam spangs pa/ /dka' dang kun+da zla ba'i mngog /nyi ma'i yi ge rnam par shes/ /tha ma bzhi ni lnga pa dang / / sde tshan drug pa yang dag ldan/ /kun nas mtshan mo'i stong par ni/ /khyad par du ni shes par bya/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon ni/ /dkar zhing shel ltar mnyam pa'i 'od/ /de nyid kun gyi de nyid ni/ /kun nas bdud rtsi'i grub pa'o/ /lha min grub pas 'gugs pa dang / /lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin dang / /thams cad las rnams grub pa ni/ /sa bon 'di ni khyad par nyid/ /sbom po ma ning gnyis kyis la/ /lcags sgrog bzhin du kha sprad pa/ /rtsa bar yang ba nyis 'gyur ro/ /spyi bor bdud rtsi rnam par dgod/ /steng du thig le 'bar ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin sku/ /sa bon lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam bzhir phye zhing phye ba yis/ /lce rtsa lce rtser gsungs pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhi dang chu yi bye brag la/ /hU~M gi rnam

465
080-233a pa rkan la sbyar/ /rtsa bar sgra dang 'od bral ba/ /bar ma yi ni dbyangs su gsungs/ /gal te 'dod na lha yi lus/ /khyad par du ni zhi ba'i las/ /snying ga'i rtsa bar gsungs pa ni/ /kha dog ser po'i 'od mnyam pa/ /sbom po'i sgra dang thig le dang / /rgyas pa dang ni me yi las/ /lte bar sgra dang 'joms pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/ /sbom po'i sgra dang ldan pa'i 'od/ /dbang gi las la rab tu sbyar/ /sna rtser sbrid pa gsum pa ni/ /kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/ / yang ba'i sgra yi 'od du ni/ /ldan par blo dang ldan par bskul/ /bskrad dang gsang dang bcing ba dang / /mnan dang gdug sogs bskrad pa dang / /gtor ma la sogs nag po'i las/ /hU~M gi rnam pa sbrid par sbyar/ /de nyid de nyid bzhi par ni/ /hU~M gi rnam pa nye bar mtshon/ /sa bon thams cad 'byin mdzad pa/ /hU~M gi rnam pa dbang phyug mchog /thams cad 'byin pa'i ngo bo bas/ /hU~M gi yi ge mchog gi lha/ /stong nyid yi ge'i hU~M gyur pas/ /hU~M gi rnam pa phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stong pa'i gzugs dang rab ldan pa/ /dngos dang dngos med 'byin mdzad pa/ /btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog /sgra dang thig le yang dag ldan/ /ri rab rgya mtsho ri ni grags/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo bar ldan/ /lha dang lha min grub pa dang / /mi dang gnod sbyin rnal 'byor ba/ / lha rnams kun nas g.yo ba ni/ /gsungs pa'i sa bon gyis 'gugs byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i sa bon ni/ /rtsa bar re pha ma nan pa dang / /lcags kyus mgor ni rnam par dgod/ /steng du zla ba'i 'od dang bcas/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lcags kyu yis ni snying po bsgrub/ /lcags kyu yi ge sa bon bzhin/ /lcags kyu yis ni kun 'gugs pa'o/ /stong bar rlung gi sa bon ni/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi dang po la/ /rtsa bar sgra yis dkri bar bya/ /spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang / /rlung gi kha dog drag po yis/ /

466
080-233b lus can kun ni bskul bar bya/ /bskul ba'i las kyi sa bon gyis/ /sa bon de nyid kun tu sbyar/ /lnga pa sde tshan gnyis pa yi/ /gsum pa'i yi ge gzung byas la/ /yi ge gsum pas mnan par bya/ /re pha rtsa bar sbyar ba dang / /steng du bdud rtsi'i thigs pa'o/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dgyes pa la sogs sa bon gyis/ /lha tshogs kun nas mnyes par byed/ /sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ /gsang ba'i sgra ni rtsa bar ro/ /steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le dang / /dkar zhing yid 'ong shin tu 'bar/ /mchod pa'i sngags kyi dus dang ni/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg phyag rgya sogs/ /rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad la/ /rgyas pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ /dang po'i sde tshan bzhi pa la/ /rtsa bar re pha sgra dang ni/ /spyi bo'i steng du 'bar ba'o/ /kha dog dmar bo mnyam pa'i 'od/ /zhi ba'i las ni rnam spangs pa/ /las rnams kun gyi sngon du'o/ /rmongs shing lus kun rmongs byed pas/ /rmongs pa'i sa bon du ni grags/ /sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa'i sa bon blang byas pa/ /mtha' ru stod pa gnyis kyis so/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba sogs/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su gzhag /bzhag pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/ /blo ldan yi ge 'di yis gzhag /stong pa'i sde tshan la spyad la/ /de yi bzhi pa gzung bar bya/ /rtsa bar ma ning sbom po dang / /steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le'o/ /'jigs pa bsrung ba'i las nyid la/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rnal 'byor de nyid 'dod pa yi/ /sa bon 'di nyid kyis bsrung ngo / /bsreg pa'i yi ge sngags nyid ni/ /dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar sogs kyi/ /las gsum gyi ni mtha' ru'o/ /bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung la/ /brgyad pa gnyis pa yi ni gdan/ /bdud rtsi yi ni gdan du chu/ /kha dog dkar po

467
080-234a /mnyam pa'i 'od/ /ma ning sde tshan gyis bskyed pa'i/ /me ltar dmar ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o/ /zhi ba la ni bsreg pa'i mthar/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon kha dog ser/ /chu yi sa bon dkar ba'i gdan/ / logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o/ /brgyad kyi mtha' ma kun nas 'bar/ /rdo rje 'od bzhin 'bar ba'i me/ /sa bon 'od bzhin 'bar bcas pa/ /dbyangs yig dbyug pa'i sreg pa'o/ /rgyas pa'i sreg pa'i mtha' mar ro/ /de yi bdud rtsi 'bar ba'i ni/ / brgyad mtha'i logs su dbyug pa'o/ /kun nas dmar dang dmar ba yi/ /mthar ni dbyug ba lcags kyu'o/ /dbu mar drang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /dbyug pa'i dbugs kyis bzla bar bya/ /chags pa'i las la rnal 'byor pas/ /sreg pa'i yi ge rnam pa gsum/ /rnam pa bzhi las don gnyer pas/ /'joms pa'i yi ge gnyis su shes/ /bskrang dang bsad dang dbye ba dang / /mnan dang nye bar bzlog pa la/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa ni/ /dbyug pa glo ru rnam par sbyar/ /nyi ma'i sde tshan gsum pa las/ /dang po gnyis pa'i glo ru'o/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /'od zer me bzhin kun nas ldan/ /rdo rje sa bon mnyam 'bar las/ /lus kyi dbus su dbug par bya/ /bsad dang gdug pa bskrad la sogs/ /drag po'i las ni thams cad la/ /dngos grub 'dod pa rnal 'byor pas/ /'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' mar ro/ /de yi sa bon ldan pa ni/ /sngon gyi dbyug tshogs rnam par spangs/ /dang po dbu yi steng rnams su/ /kha dog sngon por ba rno bas/ /gsad dang dbye dang gdug pa ni/ /khro bo'i lha yis bskrad par bya/ /'joms pa'i yi ge'i mtha' mar ni/ /sa bon 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po'i sde dang sde tshan gyi/ /dang po'i dang po blang byas la/ /kun nas rdo rje'i sa bon gyis/ /sa bon yi ge phyed dang gnyis/ /'pho bar sbyor ba'i sngon

468
080-234b dus su/ /rnam shes gong du bskul ba'o/ /lte bar rtsa ba'i phyogs nas ni/ /yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyis drang / /brgyad pa'i mtha' ni sngon du'o/ /ma la ta yi sbyor dus su/ /'pho bar sbyor bas sngon du'o/ /'pho ba'i dus kyi sngon du ni/ /rnal 'byor ba yis rab tu spyad/ /u la pa li ta sa bon/ /spyad bya'i yi ge phyed dang gnyis/ /dngos dang dngos med sa bon las/ /skra dang thig le rnam par sbyar/ /rlung gi rtsa ba'i gnas su ni/ /sgra dang sgra yis bstan pa'o/ /chu shing me tog lte bar gnas/ /sa bon 'di yis bsgyur bar bya/ /sngon du sbyor ba'i bsam gtan dang / /mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis bcing / /bdun pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon sa bon gyis/ /bzlog byas rgyas pa'i gnas su ni/ /chu shing me tog lta bur gyis/ /ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa ni/ /yi ge gsum pa gzung byas la/ /dbyug par phyi ma'i sa bon dang / /'og pag gis ni sngon dkris pa/ /de nyid de nyid kun dang ni/ /sa bon sa bon mchog gi gtso/ /theg pa rnam gsum dag byed pa/ /A li'i sa bon rab tu grags/ /sde tshan brgyad pa'i gnyis pa la/ /lcags kyu yis ni spyi bor mnan/ /spyi bor zla tshes thig le dang / /kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od/ /sems can kun nas rmongs byed pa/ /yid dbye ba la kun nas sbyar/ /kun tu rmongs ni sa bon no/ / rmongs pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /spyi bor lcags kyu 'dren pa dang / /rtsa bar re pha'i sa bon no/ /kha dog sngon po 'bar ba yi/ /dri dang me tog ro sogs mid/ /las kyis kun nas 'phrog par byed/ /'phrog byed ming gi sa bon gyis/ /'phrog pa'i las la kun tu sbyar/ /bdun pa dkar po'i sa bon ni/ /dung dang kun+da mnyam pa'i 'od/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon no/ /chu yi yi ge ming can no/ /ka shar ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /kha dog ser po 'od mnyam pa/ /me bzhin

469
080-235a 'bar zhing 'bar ba yi/ /me yi yi ger rnam par grags/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi dang bor ni/ /de nyid stong pa'i dngos po dang / /rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni/ /rlung gi sa bon du ni grags/ /brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni/ /kha dog sngon po'i 'od mnyam pa/ /snying gar sa yi sa bon ni/ /de nyid pa yi sa bon no/ /'di rnams sa bon sa bon la/ /thig le'i yi ge rtsa bar ro/ /rtsa bar nyis 'gyur re pha dang / /rlung gi sa bon gsum par ro/ /rtsa bar sgra ni bzhi pa'o/ /steng du thig le sbyar ba dang / /de nyid bzhi pa'i sa bon ni/ /bzhi pa'i yi ge drug pa'o/ /rmongs pa chu yi sa bon ni/ /g.yo ba'i rlung gi sa bon dang / /sa ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/ /phyugs ni me la kun tu sbyar/ /yi ge brgyad pa'i sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad sems dang bcas/ /bdag nyid de nyid gtso bo yi/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ /thams cad kun nas spyi bo dang / /yi ge kun nas gnas pa'o/ /sa bon 'di ni kun nas bzung / /ye shes sa bon zhes bya'i ming / /rtag pa'i rtsa bar mnan pa dang / / sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po kun+da zla ba'i mchog /ye shes rnam shes sa bon nyid/ /rgyu pa'i gzugs kyi sa bon ni/ /sa bon sa bon de bas mchog /ye shes rnams shes bya ba'i ming / /las kun la ni rab sbyar bya/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba ni/ /zhi ba'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che/ /mthar ni swA hA ring por ldan/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i sngags pa yis/ /gnyi ga lus la bsgoms nas ni/ /'di yis lha mo sbyar bar bya/ /sngags bas bsreg pa'i sngags pa ni/ /sngon du dbyug pa med pa'o/ /lha mo'am yang na lha mo la/ /khro bo'i gzugs 'joms la sogs pa'i/ /'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' bzhag ste/ /bzlas shing bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /gzugs dang gzugs can dngos po yis/ /khro bo khro mo khyad par nyid/ /sreg

470
080-235b dang 'joms pa'i sa bon ni/ /khyad par dang ni khyad par can/ /de nyid de nyid kun gyis ni/ /rab tu spyad cing blta bar bya/ /de nyid med pa'i sngags pa ni/ /dngos grub ring du bstan pa yin/ /bsgrub pa'i dus su lha nyid kyi/ /sa bon mtha' ra bzlas pa bya/ /mchog tu zhi ba'i de nyid la/ /dang po dbyangs yig mtha' ru'o/ /khro bo mo'i lha la ni/ /rdo rje'i sa bon mtha' mar ro/ /lha mo kun gyi de nyid la/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge mtha' mar ro/ /dang po sngags kyi sa bon ni/ /phyag 'tshal gcig ni rnam spangs nas/ /bdag nyid ming gi sa bon dang / /gnyi ga yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu/ /stong dang stong pa'i sa bon ni/ /bar ma bsgrub pa'i lha nyid do/ /nyin mo'i yi ge dang po ru/ /bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i ming nyid ni/ /de yi sgrub pa'i las rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rnam par mtshon/ / sngags pas sngon gyi dus su ni/ /rab tu blta zhib spyad par bya'o/ /nyin mo stong pa'i sgrub pa ni/ /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /nyin mo nyin mo nyin mo sgrub/ /stong pa stong pa bar ma'o/ /go bzlog pa yi sa bon ni/ /lhag pa'i yi ge brtsi bar byed/ /nyin bar bsgrub bya lhag ma ni/ /sgrub pa po la bu lon ni/ /bsgrub bya stong pa lhag pa ni/ /dag nyid pas na 'dras bu med/ /rab tu blta zhing spyad pa yis/ /sngags kyi sgrub pa shes pa yin/ /sngon du ma ning sa bon dang / /de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma ning nyid/ /dbus sum ning yi ge ni/ /dngos grub stong par bshad pa yin/ /de nyid 'de yi sa bon gyis/ /rang 'dod lha nid bsgrub par bya/ /thog ma tha ma khyad par du/ /dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming nyid do/ /mtho dang dma' dang bar ma dang / /khyad nyid kyang ni khyad par ro/ /zhi dang rgyas pa la sogs la/ /khyad par sa bon ldan pa nyid/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la/ /rtsa bar re pha sgra nyid dang / /steng du zla tshes thig le dang / /kha dog ser po kun 'od la/ /lha mo rnal 'byor ma kun gyis/ /snying po yi ni snying po mchog /gong du

471
080-236a phyag 'tshal yi ge dang / /'don bzhin ming ni dbus su'o/ /mtha' dang mtha' ni bsreg sogs nyid/ /thams cad du ni kun nas ldan/ /stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la/ /spyi bor e yi rnam pas mtshan/ /rtsa bar nA da thig ler bcas/ /kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dga' byed las kyi sa bon gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dga' bar byed/ /de nyid kun gyi sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor ma kun gyis rab spyad/ /de nas sman sogs rim pa ni/ /khyad par nyid du sbyar bar bya/ /bla re bla re nyid dang ni/ /spos dang bdug pa dril sogs/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs pa/ /sngon du gnyis med gtor mar ldan/ /dri yi maN+Dal gru bzhi pa/ /dbus su rnal 'byor bas bri ba/ /gur gum shin tu dri zhim ldan/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /blo dang ldan pas gru bzhi bri/ /dbang po la sogs re'u mig nas/ /blo dang ldan pas yi ge dgod/ /dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/ /de yi sa bon spang dbus so/ /nyin mo'i yi ge thams cad nyid/ /lhag ma'i sde tshan brgyad pa yi/ /sa bon mnyam par gzhag pa dgod/ /sgra dang thig ler yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa'o/ /gu gul dbang po'i lag pa dad/ /rmongs byed rengs byed de bzhin sgra/ /sat+ta si hA tsam pa ka/ /ku tu ru dang ko li ki/ /son rtsi ka dang pa bla dang / /gu gul ru rta dUr ba kar/ /me dang dri dang gur gum dang / /tsan+dan gi wang yang dag ldan/ /sha khar dang li shi dang / /pri yang ku dang ge sar dang / /chu srin sder mo nub phyogs cha/ /re'u mig kun dang gnas kun tu/ /dbang po la sogs sman rim bzhin/ /rdzas ni re re re re dang / /cha la sa bon bzlas par bya/ /phyag 'tshal dang po bsreg pa mtha'/ /brgyad dang brgyad du bzlas pa bya/ /cha dang ldan sogs sa bon ni/ /sman dang ldan na de

472
080-236b bas mchog /bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /gu gul la sogs sbyar byas nas/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal dbang la/ /mkhas pas byin pas dbang du byed/ /bdag nyid lnga yi lnga dang ni/ /sha da wa sogs sbyar byas nas/ /re pa'i rdzas la bsgoms byas na/ /ji ltar sngon dang sngon bzhin nyid/ /rje'u rigs bram ze dmangs rigs dang / /skyes pa'am yang na bud med la/ /bza' ba'i dngos po byin pa yis/ /dbang du 'gyur bar yongs su grags/ /skyo byed la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /son rtsi ka yi cha dang sbyar/ /brtul zhugs dman pa'i rigs rnams ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dbang du byed/ /me da la sogs sman rim dang / /mi yi mar khu yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas dpyad cing brtags pa yis/ /mnyam pa'i cha dang ma ru bya/ /thig le'u ni sbyin byas na/ /rgyal po'i rigs la 'gro ba dang / /tha snyad las ni rnam par rgyal/ /'gro ba yang dag rmongs par byed/ /dang po sha kha ra sogs dang / /tsan+dan dang ni rnam par sbyar/ /sde tshan gcig gi cha dang ni/ /tsan+dan gyi ni cha nyid dang / / byams pa'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa/ /yan lag nying lag byug byas nas/ /dri ni sna la man mas tsam gyis/ /nges par dbang du byed pa'o/ /mtshams dang mtshams kyis sha kha ra/ /sbrang rtsi'i cha dang sbyar nas ni/ /mchog tu bsgoms shing bdug pa yis/ /kun nas nges par dbang du byed/ /mtshams kyi nang gi kun bzung nas/ /sha khar yi cha dang bsre/ /bdug pas bdug cing bdug byas nas/ /mi ni kun nas rmongs par byed/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul nas ni/ /sa bon so so'i sa bon nyid/ /kun nas brgya phrag gcig tu'o/ /de bzhin du ni dmar po'i las/ /de yi rjes ni kun bzung la/ /bdag nyid ye shes lta ru'o/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i

473
080-237a 'od/ /de nyid sa bon bzlas pa yis/ /g.yo ba dang ni ltung bar byed/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /skyed par re pa thig le can/ /khri phrag gcig tu bzlas pa yis/ /gnyis kyis ltung ba'am g.yo bar byed/ /phyi nas gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo grub par byed/ /gu gul la sogs srin bu lngas/ /rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar byas nas/ /phra ba'i sgo nga tsam zos pas/ /mod la myur du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /sha ta ca sogs srin bu ni/ /'o ma bdun par sbyar byas pa'i/ /zhag bdun las lhag par zos na/ /'chi ba 'di la the tshom med/ /son rtsi kar sogs srin bu lnga/ /sbrang rtsi smyo byed lnga ba ni/ /bza' dang btung ba sbyin byas nas/ / skyo byed myos bar 'gyur ba'o/ /med la sogs srin bu lnga/ /sbrul gyi sgo ngar bzlas byas nas/ /thig le tsam zhig zos pas ni/ /skad cig de la mdze yis 'dzin/ /kha ra'i sde tshan srin bu ni/ /mgo la sgong dang ldan par/ /de yi phye ma zos pa yis/ / mi ni dbyangs dang bral bar 'gyur/ /mtshams kyi khar kun bzung la/ /sbrang rtsi mar gyi cha dang spyar/ /de yi phye ma bza' byas na/ /de yi mod la gzir bas 'dzin/ /mtshams kyi nang gi yang dag gzung / /sbrang rtsi lhan cig bsgo byas pa'i/ /phra rab tsam zhig zos pa yi/ /mod la rims kyis gdung bar byed/ /de nyid rab sbyor snying po ni/ /gsang zhing gsang ba'i lung gi don/ /ye shes ldan zhing blo ldan pa'i/ /lus kyi rim pa rnam par blta/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang / /slob dpon dang ni gsang smod pa/ /sdeg gis gos par mi 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs/ /lnga pa'am lnga ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba bstan pa rdzogs so// //de nas gzhan gyi rim pa ni/ /sman rnams kyi ni khyad par nyid/ /de nyid kun gyi mchog 'gyur ba/ /

474
080-237b mchog gi snying po snying po nyid/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ /cho ga rim bzhin sman dang sngags/ /de nyid gtor ma'i las dang ni/ /dri yi re'u mig dgod par bya/ /bcu dgu dang ni sum cu yi/ /gru bzhi pa yi re'u mig dgod/ /nyin mo stong pa'i sa bon dang / /sde tshan tha ma dgod par bya/ /dbang po la sogs gnas rnams su/ /dang por dbyangs yig rim ji bzhin/ /re'u mig kun gyi sa bon ni/ /sman sogs bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /na ki b+ha la bi ling ga/ /ru rta bu ram b+ha sa ka/ /ka sa la sogs bdun pa ni/ /dbang ldan la sogs gnas su dgod/ /dbang po'i lag pa shu dag dang / /rmongs byed dang ni tsan+dan dang / /tsan+dan dang ni gur gum nyid/ /bdun pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /cha mnyam pa ni gnyis pa'o/ /ga bur sA li shu dag dang / / gur gum rkun mo gi wang dang / /sbrang rtsi bdun pa yi ni cha/ /gsum pa'i re'u mig sde tshan no/ /sa rdzar gu gul ru rta dang / /g+han d+hi kha ra kun du ru/ /me tog phreng ba bdun pa ni/ /bzhi pa'i re'u mig gnas su'o/ /ka ko la dang sha ta dang / /ge sar so rtsi rgya skyegs dang / /pa tra bdun pa'i cha nyid ni/ /lnga pa'i las su yongs su grags/ /dri dang bcud len k+Sha ra dang / /yung ba dang ni kha ra tra/ /k+Shau dri bi bi ling gi cha/ /drug pa'i re'u mig mig yin no/ /dan ta dan ta ku su ma/ /rams dang gar sma be ta ki/ /sar rnams ni bdun pa'i cha/ /bdun pa'i sman gyi rim pa'o/ /brgya phyed gcig gis mtshang bar/ /re'u mig kun sogs sman nyid do/ /re re la yang sngags 'di ni/ /brgya phrag mngon par rab bsngags te/ /dang po chu srin sde tshan sogs/ /bdag nyid bdun gyi bdun pa ni/ /mthar ni phye ma sbyar byas te/ /shin tu zhi ba mor mkhas pas btags/ /'dus pa rgyal po rgyal dbang gi/ /bza' dang btung dang ldan par sbyin/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'dod pa bzhin/ /kun nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /dang po

475
080-238a la sogs sde tshan ni/ /phra zhing zhib par rab tu bya/ /phye ma kun nas blangs nas ni/ /bdag nyid mchil mas de bzhin bdun/ /bza' dang ston mor cho ga bzhin/ /rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bya/ /skyes pa'am ni bud med dam/ /thams cad kun nas 'od 'gyur ro/ /dang por shel gyi sde tshan ni/ /mnyam por cha de phyed mar bya/ /mi yi snum dang kun tu sbyar/ /grib ma dang ni grib mar bskams/ /cho lor 'jug cing dga' ba dang / /snga dro thig le sbyin byas na/ /rgyal po'i rigs la nyer 'gro ba/ / skye bo skal can myur du 'gyur/ /sa rdza sngon sogs dbang por sbyar/ /phye ma zhib tu byas nas ni/ /sbrang rtsi kha ra'i cha nyid dang / /rang 'dod spos chu rab sbyar nas/ /mi dga' ba kun dga' ba dang / /ngag gi 'dren pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de yi bdug pas bdugs pa'i lus/ /'gro ba kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /ka ko la sogs dang ldan pas/ /phye ma mnyam por char byas te/ /tsan+dan dang po thams cad kun/ /cha gsum du ni bya bar bya/ /mi byams sman zhing bkur pa ni/ /skal ldan mdzes par 'dod 'gyur na/ /de yi yan lag la byugs la/ /'gro ba rnam par rmongs byed yin/ /dri yi sde tshan bdun par ni/ /ka ko la sogs dang ldan par/ /mar dang 'o ma dang bsres nas/ /kun gyi cha dang sbyar byas nas/ /grib ma'i grib mar bskam par bya/ /rigs dman kla klo la sogs kun/ /yid mi 'ong ba byams par 'gyur/ /'di yi sbyor ba sbyin byas nas/ /dang gi 'dod bzhin byed pa'o/ /da na ti mnyam pa'i cha nyid dang / /rgya skyegs la sogs kun gyi cha/ /me la bsrobar rab tu sbyar/ /ka ra na dza yi rdog ma tsam/ /yid du mi 'ong ba yi gnas/ /khar bcug kun tu de yi dag /tshig gsum tshig tu brjod pa yis/ /bdag 'dod pa bzhin dbang du byed/ /mtshams kyi dan ti la sogs pa/ /smyo byed chu ni lnga ba dang / /bdag nyid bcings bar sngon ldan pas/ /mchog tu bsgoms na

476
080-238b 'dug par bya/ /bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas na/ /sgrub pos sna la mnams tsam gyis/ /de yi rang 'dod su la ni/ /dbang du gyur par yongs su grags/ /mtshams kyis ra la sogs blang / /phye ma zhib mor byas na ni/ /bdag nyid dri ma lnga dang ni/ /kun nas cha ni mnyam byas la/ /phye ma zhib mo yang dag ldan/ /'di yi sman dang ldan pa yis/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la reg byas na/ /nges par dbang du byed pa'o/ /cha dang cha yi bye brag ni/ /mkhas shing bzo bar byas bar bya/ /khyad par sman gyi las 'di ni/ /cho ga bzhin du rnam par blta/ /rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba ni/ /pad+ma'i gdan gyi gdan la bzhugs/ /kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /btso ma gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /a ni thig le yang dag ldan/ / 'bar zhir rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /bsgrub bya'i sems ni 'grugs par byed/ /mi 'gyur yi ge'i thig le dang / /rtsa bar sgra yis rab tu sbyar/ /mthang ni bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ming / /'bum phrag gcig gis rab tu bsgrub/ /sman gyi sbyor bar ldan pa ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil du kun nas bya/ /gtor ma de nyid byin brlabs nas/ /'bum dang 'bum du bsnyen pa bya/ /sngon du da na ti'i yan lag dang / /thig le brgya par kun nas ldan/ /bza' ba'i dngos pos sbyin byas na/ /mi yi skad cig rnam par spangs/ /da na ta la sogs srin bu dang / /ra yi 'o mar bsres byas na/ /gang gis zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /zhag bdun na ni nges par 'chi/ /ku gsum srin bu bdun dang ni/ /smyo byed chu ni rnam pa lnga/ /bza' bar zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /smyo zhing smyo bar 'gyur ba'o/ /rams kyi lam sogs sde tshan dang / /dkar por srin bu sbyar nas ni/ /bza' ba'i dngos por sbyin byas na/ /thams cad kun nas 'thab par 'gyur/ /ka mi srin bu'i sde tshan dang / /mi yi mar khu dang sbyar nas/ /phye mas yan lag la reg na/ /skal ngan mi byams pa dag ni/ /tsi te

477
080-239a sde tshan bdun pa ni/ /nor bur sgong ldan bzlas nas/ /thig le tsam zhig zos pa yis/ /mong la tshor ba mi bzad 'byung / /sa yal sogs sde tshan dang / /nyi shur ra yi chu yis spangs/ /cung zhig tsam zhig zos pa yis/ /nyi ma nyi shu na de 'chi/ /dan ti mtshams kyi srin bu dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar nas ni/ /bza' dang btung ba zos nas ni/ /mdze nad kyis ni yan lag gzir/ /mtshams sogs thang chu'i srin bu ni/ /bza' dang btung bar rab byin na/ /rnam par rmongs shing dran pa nyams/ / de nyid med cing mnyam gzhag med/ /rab sbyor snying po bsdus pa nyid/ /gsang zhing gsang bar byas pa yi/ /rmongs shing blun pa'i sems can sogs/ /sbyor ba 'di yis longs spyod ldan/ /dkon mchog gsum la brnyas pa dang / /slob dpon dang ni gsang smod dang / /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ba/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs/ /nyon mongs rmongs sogs bag chags dang / /shes rab zhan cing yid mi gzhungs/ /sngags kyi snod min snying rje med/ /sman gyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni/ /gsum pa yi ni gsum pa'o/ /de yi sbyor ba mthong nas ni/ /brda yi skad kyis bsdus pa'o/ /le'u bzhi pa zhes bya pa rdzogs so// //de yi rtsa ba'i snying po'i don/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba'i rim pa yi/ /de nyid bsdus pa'i 'grub pa'o/ /de nyid sman pas lus nyon mongs/ /shes rab thabs ni rgyur gyur pas/ /rang 'dod las ni bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab ye shes snang ba'o/ /thabs ni rigs pa'i tshul nyid do/ /rnal 'byor shes rab rtsa ba 'di/ /thabs ni de yi grogs nyid do/ / gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/ /nyon mongs lus las rnam par rgyal/ /srid pa'i nyes skyon du ma yang / /srid pa dang ni rmongs pa gzhi/ /dngos po'i gnas ni mi rtag pas/ /de phyir shes rab yongs su spangs/ /dngos med dngos po yang ma yin/ /skye

478
080-239b pa dang ni 'gag pa med/ /dngos po yongs su gnas pa med/ /'jigs pa yi ni rnam pa med/ dngos dang dngos med la sogs mtha'/ /dag dang ma dag dbus su ni/ /de yi mtshan nyid sngon shes nas/ /mnyam pa'i lta ba ldan par gzung / /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol ba'i/ /dngos po'i 'du shes rnam par spangs/ /sangs rgyas kyis rtogs bstan bcos las/ /yongs su brtags nas snying po blang / /dngos med dngos por gzung par bya/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin rnam par spangs/ /dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas pas/ /'o ma bsrubs pa las ni mar/ /mchog gi snying po yang dag blang / /mnyam par lta ba 'ba' zhig go/ /bstan bcos bstan zhing yongs shes na/ /de yi mtshan nyid dngos po med/ /yang dag lam la dmigs pa yis/ /dngos po mchog dang mchog tu 'grub/ /ji bzhin gnas kyi rim pa brten/ /ye shes mchog tu gong nas gong / /gzhan gyi gnas las 'phangs pa yi/ /mnga' yis mnga' ni bsnun par bya/ /gong nas gong la sogs par blta/ /rang 'dod dngos por yang dag blang / /bdun pa'i dgra las rnam par rgyal/ /'khor pa'i dgra yi g.yul nyid ni/ /gang zhig thabs dang shes rab ldan/ /dgra yi dngos po gang du gnas/ /le lo gnyid dang 'dod pa dang / /khro dang rmongs pa srod pa dang / /khro ba yis ni yan lag gzir/ /thabs kyis bdud ni rnam par sbangs/ /le lo nyes skyon kun gyi gnas/ /gnyid kyis dge ba rnam par 'joms/ /khro ba yis ni sring pas 'dren/ /'dod pas dran pa rnam par nyams/ /rmongs pa yis ni gnyis kyis non/ /sreng ba yis ni 'khor bar 'jug /bkres pas dman zhing sdang ba yi/ /bdud bdun po ni yongs su srangs/ /kun nas bdud kyis 'bigs pa yi/ /lus ni nyon mongs sdug bsngal gnas/ /rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis ni/ /dul bar bsrubs shing mnan par bya/ /gang

479
080-240a dang gang gi lam du ni/ /rang 'dod sems kyi 'bad pa yis/ /thams cad snying po bsdus nas ni/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni brtsam par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas/ /smon lam bla med rgyu yi ni/ /o~M swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ badzra shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+harmA badzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ smon lam kun mchog don du ni/ /lha nyid dmigs par bya ba yis/ /rnam shes rang 'dod par byas pas/ /sred dang rmongs pa rnam par spangs/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bdag nyid lus ni rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can/ /dung dang kun+da mnyam pa'i 'od/ /bdag nyid sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /phyag na rdo rje dril bu dang / /sku la rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje me 'od rab 'phro ba/ /'jigs pa med cing 'tshe med par/ /dngos po dngos por bsgom par bya/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /sa bon sa bon byung ba yi/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag pa/ /rang 'dod pa yi sems kyis bzla/ /rim bzhin 'gags pa'i phyi nas ni/ /bdag med shin tu mnyam par gzhag /gzugs kun rnam par dbug nas ni/ /khams gsum du ni mi rtog go/ /zla ba la sogs bdag nyid med/ /kun nas thams cad stod par rig /stong nyid stong pa stong chen dang / /dngos med dngos por bsgoms pa yis/ /bsgoms nas lhag ma'i mtha' ru ni/ /rnam shes sgron ma lta bur 'bar/ /de yi 'od zer snang ba yis/ /khams gsum mun pa bsal nas ni/ /'bar zhing rab tu phra ba'o/ /rnam shes ye shes snang ba nyid/ /dngos dang dngos po med pa'i dbus/ /gzugs dang gzugs med dbus nyid dang / /'du shes 'du shes med par ldan/ /yud tsam lta bar rig pa'o/ /gzugs dang stong ba la sogs dbus/ /'di yi mtshan nyid mtshon pa nyid/ /'gog pa'i sbyor ba'i rim

480
080-240b pa ni/ /shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/ /yan lag gzir med pa dang / /sems kyi skyo ba med pa yis/ /rim dang rim pa tsam byas nas/ /'khor ba gcod cing gcod pa'o/ /rtag tu nyid kyi sems kyis ni/ /yang dag byang chub rim pa bstan/ /shin tu bcad cing bltas nas ni/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni blang bar bya/ /o~M b+ha ta li b+ta ta li pe ta mu khi hU~M phaT swA hA/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor gyis/ /brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya/ /gzugs kun rdzogs shing mdzes pa yi/ /btso ma'i gser dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje 'od zer kun nas 'phro/ /ye shes sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni/ /sngags pas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na/ /'dod dang grol ba rgya chen po'i/ /phyis ni las rnams brtsam par bya/ /dur khrod thal ba sogs blangs la/ /snod la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi sol ba'i phye ma yis/ /gang du dkyil 'khor sprul ba yis/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma bri/ /thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ / dri dang bdug pa mar me dang / /gtor ma'i de nyid de nyid dang / /kun nas nya phyes dngos po yi/ /sna tshogs mchod pa rgya chen po/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro dgug pa ni/ /pho nya bzhi dang kun tu ldan/ /seng ge stag mo ce spyang dang / /'ug pa mo ni phyogs bzhir ro/ /thams cad kun nas kun tu ni/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis mchod/ /de yi shar gyi gnas su ni/ /me yi las ni rab tu bya/ /dur khrod shing gi lhag ma dang / /de yi shing gi ba dan gsum/ /de'am 'on te gdol pa'i mes/ /'bad pas me ni rab tu sbar/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rgya chen po/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres byas pas/ /mchog gi sngags ni bzla bya zhing / /bsregs pas lha mo tshim par 'gyur/ /thams cad gnas dang phyogs nas ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni 'jigs pa dang / /

481
080-241a mi bzad ku co rab sgrogs na/ /'jigs par mi 'joms par 'gyur/ /dbung gi tshogs ni yan lag bzhi/ /rgyal bo myur du 'ong 'gyur na/ /de la tsham dam sbyin par bya/ /ri rab ri la sogs pa dang / /sa gzhi 'ur 'ur 'gul ba dang / /sna tshogs mi bzad dri dang ni/ /'dren pa'i sems ni 'jig mi bya/ /sems can chen po'i rnal 'byor pas/ /khri phrag gcig tu bsreg byas na/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdun nyid ni/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i bya ba dang / /gtor ma'i las dang las nyid dang / /lus la ltos ba med pa yis/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /phyi nas ye shes lha mo ni/ /me yi dbus su ston par byed/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /gtor ma dang ni ar+g+haM dbul/ /zab cing rgya cher sgrogs pa yi/ /de la lha mo tshig tu brjod/ /sems can chen po ci zhig 'grub/ /gang 'dod dngos grub rab tu smros/ /de la sgrub pos smras pa ni/ /dngos grub chen po 'grub ldan pa'i/ /gal te mchog gi dngos grub 'dod/ /grub pa brgyad ni gsol ba gdab/ /bdud dang nyon mongs gza' sogs kyis/ /gal te yid gnyis skyes nas ni/ /til mar chen po dang ldan pa'i/ /lcags kyu chen po sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ / dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'i/ /mchog gi lha mo bsgrub pa ni/ /lus dang srog la mi ltos par/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas ye shes de nyid mchog /shin tu phra la rab zhi ba/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /'byung ba kun la 'dis khyab pa/ /'od kyi bdag nyid gnas pa'i mi/ /ma rig nyon mongs gcod byed pa/ /srid pa la sogs nyon mongs rnams/ /gang dug nas kyi rnam pa 'byung / /lus la sems shing sems pa dang / /bcu gnyis dus kyi gnas su yang / /

482
080-241b gzugs med sems kyi longs spyod pa'o/ /rmongs pa'i gnas dang gnas su ni/ /srid pa'i ngo bo nyid du mchod/ /rmongs pa gcod sogs rnal 'byor pa/ /srid pa'i 'dam sogs rgal dka' ba/ /dag pa'i chos kyi sgron ma yis/ /sgrib pa'i mtshan ma 'joms pa yi/ /chos dag pa yi thabs kyis ni/ /dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa'o/ /dngos dang dngos med ldan pa yis/ /legs byas nyes byas 'du shes can/ /'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs dag /rgya mtsho lta bur gting dpag dka'/ / bcu gnyis lus kyi bdag nyid can/ /rmongs pa ye shes rnam par gnas/ /dag pa'i chos kyi chu yis ni/ /lhan cig gnas pa'i dri ma 'khru/ /rang bzhin pad+ma'i dbye ba yis/ /nyon mongs la sogs gdung ba gcod/ /rnam rtog 'jigs pa chen po ni/ /srid pa'i rgyu ste me bzhin no/ /de phyir rnam rtog ring du spang / /rnal 'byor ba yi 'gro ba rtogs/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed byas nas/ /kun nas thams cad mnyam par blta/ /rab tu mi gnas ming can la/ /las dang las kyi mtshan nyid med/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin yang / /bdud rtsis lus ni tshim par bya/ /rtag tu bdud rtsis mchod pa'o/ /dngos su med na rnam par brtag /lcags kyu rnam pa lnga drangs nas/ /thams cad kun nas rim pas mchod/ /sbyor bas mkha' 'gro la sogs ni/ /bdag nyid dbang du myur du 'gyur/ /rtag tu de nyid kyis bza' zhing / /med na gzhan las rnam par brtag /gsher ba'i bdud rtsi kun nas bas ma/ /bza' ba yang na sha nyid du/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yis/ /rtags dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i dpa' bo ni/ /dag pa'i lus su gdon mi za/ /rtag tu rnal 'byor ba spangs pa/ /bgrod dang bgrod min rnam par spangs/ /lo ma'i dang ni 'dab ma'i rgyu/ /snod la thams cad myu gu'i/ /de yi pad+ma

483
080-242a rgyas byed pa/ /dag pa'i mtshan ma dang po'o/ /kha dog ngan zhing dri mi zhim/ /btung ba dro ba rnam par spangs/ /dag pa'i ngo bo gcod byed pa/ /gnyis pa'i mtshan mar bstan pa'o/ /kun la dga' zhing byams pa dang / /gnod pa nam yang mi byed cing / /sems can kun la snying brtse ba/ /gsum pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/ /rtag tu stong pa'i blo ldan pas/ /zab cing rgya che'i sems kyis ni/ /thams cad rtsa bzhin du ni stong / /bzhi pa'i mtshan ma nyid du bstan/ /dag cing brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /lus gcig la ni rab lhos pa/ /rtag tu gsang sogs za ba ni/ /lnga ba'i mtshan ma ru ni gsungs/ /brtson 'grus kun nas ldan pa dang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /bsam gtan mchog tu brten byed pa/ /drug pa'i mtshan ma ru ni brtag /bzo dang sgyu rtsal nyan pa dang / /rtag tu mnyam pa'i sems dang ni/ /rtag tu sems can don la brtson/ /bdun pa yi ni mtshan mar bstan/ /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi blo rtogs byed/ /srid pa yang dag byang chub lam/ /mtshan ma brgyad pa ru ni bstan/ /'ga' yang nam du mi smod cing / /rdzas dang rdzas min rnam rtog bcas/ /gdug pa'i bdud dang bgegs sogs dang / /rnam par rtog pas srid bar ltung / /dka' thub sdug bsngal mi bzad pas/ /bsnyen pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ /lus ni dka' bar spyod pa yis/ /'khor zhing srid pa'i mtha' ru'o/ /rnam rtog med pas mnyam par bya/ /dngos po mtshan ma'i sems dang bcas/ /sbyor ba grub pa'i don du ni/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis bza'/ /bsgrubs pa rang 'dod snying po ni/ /g.yong nga mi g.yo dngos grub rgyu/ /chos kyi snying po snying po nyid/ /sems ni ye shes rang bzhin ldan/ /sbyor ba'i bstan bcos cha nyid ni/ /de nyid de nyid khyad par ro/ /sbyar dang bsam gtan byas

484
080-242b pa yis/ /rtag tu sems ni sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor rjes rnal 'byor dang / /rnal 'byor las 'das gnas chen po/ /las bzhi dang ni rab ldan pa'i/ /ye shes kyis ni 'khor bsgrol/ /dang por bskyed rim spyod pa dang / /dbugs kyi sbyor ba rim sogs dang / /las la sems shing sem la dang / /dang po'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /me bzhin du ni za ba dang / /mnyam pa'i nyi ma bzhin du blta/ /rna dbang rlung gi rang bzhin du/ /rna ba sgra yi mchod par ldan/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs mchod pa'o/ /gtor mas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ /gnyis pa shin tu sbyor ba'o/ /dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag sbyar/ /phyag rgya chen po yi ni thabs/ /sbyor ba las 'das 'di nyid do/ /rang bzhin gyis ni legs spyad na/ /thams cad bdag med pa las byung / /lus sogs stong bar rtogs pa ni/ /bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o/ /'di rnams mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /chen po'i sems kyi sdom pa'o/ /rtag tu bya ba der 'jug pas/ /'byung zhing 'khor bar sgrol ba'o/ /spyan ni pad+ma ltar yangs shing / /bzhin ni me tog rgyas pa 'dra/ /'dod pa lnga po nye bar bsten/ /bde bar spyo cing bde bar reg /'dod pa kun dang nyer ldan pa/ /bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /srid par 'khor zhing 'jug pa'o/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /rang bzhin ldan pa'i las kyis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar nas/ /sor mo 'brel par byas nas ni/ /dri med gsum dang dud pas sprel/ /sems ma rdo rje rab tu grags/ /tsham dam phur bu ra ba dang / /dra ba thams cad las nyid do/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /'di yi phyag rgyar bstan

485
080-243a par bya/ /kha ga'i phyogs gzhan nyid dang ni/ /rtsa bar rlung dbang gnon pa dang / /spyi bor 'bar ba'i re ba dang / /mtshan ma'i mnga' bdag gis brgyan cing / /rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi gnas/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od/ /'di ltar sa bon mdor byas pa/ /thams cad las ni bsgrub pa'o/ /lus la sgra yis kun tu dgang / /gzugs la sogs pa zad par byed/ /sa bon lus kyi bdag nyid ni/ /sa bon lhag ma bsam par bya/ /go cha'i bsrung ba dang bral zhing / /thams cad yan lag drug gi las/ /stong pa'i de nyid snying po ni/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /smad pa dang ni bstod pa'ang med/ /ci 'byor dag pa'i bza' ba dang / /dbang po yul dang longs spyod ni/ /mnyam pa nyid du sems kyis bya/ /sngon du rig pas smon lam rnams/ /bsgrub bya bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu rtogs/ /gang zhing yid la 'dod spyod pa/ /de yi thabs ni rdo rje'i/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /rked pa'i phyogs su bzung nas ni/ /hU~M gi dbyangs kyis kun bkang zhing / /grub pa'i glu yis mnyam par bya/ /dza dza dza dza/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bzhugs pa'i bdag po khyod/ /ha ha ha ha/ hU~M yig mgon po dam tshig bdag po bdag phyag 'tshal/ /ba ba ba ba/ rdo rje sgrog gi gsang ba las byung sku 'dzin pa/ /a a a a/ a ho ma gu pa'i rdo rje A li gcig tu thim par hU~M/ /'di ltar gsang ba'i glu chen po/ /rnal 'byor ma kun tshim byed pa/ /rtse gcig rnal 'byor sems bcas pas/ /khu byug skad ltar snyan pa'i sgras/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/ /khams gsum snying po'i dbus su ni/ /rlung gi nam mkha' ltar dag pas/ /sems nyid rlung bzhin nam mkhar brjod/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/ /A li sa bon 'od

486
080-243b dang bcas/ /las kyi sa bon mdog tu ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /'byin dang sdud cing gcod mdzad ma/ /A li'i sa bon rab tu grags/ /ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi/ /yi ge gsum pa bzung byas te/ /glo ru dbyug pa rdo rje dang / /'og bag gis ni dkri bar bya/ /'di ltar rnal 'byor mchog bsgom pa/ /'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed/ /phyi nas bdag nyid lus po ni/ /sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun nas chu yis gang bar ni/ /phyogs brgyad du ni mnyam par ro/ /de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i/ /pad+ma dkar po yid 'ong ba'i/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /'o ma zla ba'i bon 'dzin/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par bkab/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/ /de yi sa bon las skyes pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni/ /kun dkar dang zla ba'i mdog /phyag gnyis pa la mdzes pa'i brang / /dbu rgyan sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje snying gar mtha' 'dzin cing / /g.yon pa dril bu dku ru brten/ /sgeg cing spro ba'i rang bzhin dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po/ /dngos po'i tshon gyis btso bar bya/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab rgyas pa'i/ /rdo rje rnon po'i 'od 'phro ba/ /'jigs pa med cing gnod med par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /bzlas 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /spro ba'i sems kyis mnyam par bsgom/ /dbus su mchog gi sa bon dang / /phyag 'tshal A lir mthar bzhag pa/ /yi ge drug pa'i sngags chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o/ /zlos dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas/ /rang 'dod las ni mngon par 'grub/ /'bum phrag gsum du bsnyen pa yis/ /de nas de yi mngon du 'grub/ /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /skye

487
080-244a dang 'jig dang rnam bral ba/ /gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor bas/ /'dod bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu de nyid dang / /ye shes sku ni gnyis kyi gzugs/ /rdo rje g.yas brkyang gnas nas ni/ /dril bu mnan pa'i rkang pas gnon/ /pad+ma rdo rje sbyar byas nas/ /phyag rgya 'ching bar mchog tu brtson/ /dril bu lag gnyis kyis mgrin par/ /rdo rje gcig gis nu mar reg /g.yon pas gzhung tshigs mtha' ru'o/ /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir mdzad cing / /gnyis kyis sems kyi mchog brtson par/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus gnyis dang / /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /thams cad stong pa'i de nyid ni/ /sems kyis rab tu spyad par bya/ /mthar ni sgron ma'i rnam pa'o/ /dbus su A li'i sa bon ni/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba rab tu 'phro/ /khams gsum kun gyi cha dang bcas/ /phyis ni gzugs nyid yongs rdzogs pa/ /gnyis ka yid 'ong gzugs mdzes pa'o/ /dbyig pa rdo rje 'jam pa'i mgon/ / 'od dpag shes rab gyi ni gzhi/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor bas/ /mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje gsang bas mtshan nas ni/ /gnyis ka 'khyud nas bzlas par bya/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag nas/ /dbus su A li'i sa bon ni/ /rtag pa mchog tu phra ba nyid/ /bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /yid kyi mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ /kun nas yid kyis bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab rdo rje yang dag par sbyor ba'i le'u rdzogs so// //de nas thams cad snying po ni/ /mchog gi gtso bo bsdus pa'o/ /sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /gus pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /shel gyi rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dag pa'i dngos por bza' bar bya/ /sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/ /dag pa'i ngo bor

488
080-244b bsgom pa nyid/ /de nas rtog pa mi rtog pa/ /bza' dang bza' min mnyam pa nyid/ /btung dang mi btung rang 'dod du'o/ /'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pas/ /sngon du dbang bskur dpa' bo rnams/ /'bad pas brtul zhugs gzung bar bya/ /rim pa bzhin du zla ba dang / /nyi ma 'am ni lo dus su/ /brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o/ /yon tan de yi yongs su bza'/ /bcwa lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang / /khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o/ /brtul zhugs rim pa 'di nyid ni/ /nan tan gyis ni gtor ma sbyin/ /de yi las rnams thams cad ni/ /ye shes de nyid 'bras bu sogs/ /de ltar bden pa'i sngags kun gyis/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /bza' sogs ston mo'i rnal 'byar pas/ /zla ba tha ma'i nyi ma gzung / /Rang 'dod chos ni rab brtags na/ /thams cad sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs ldan pa nyin re'am/ /gal te ma 'byor pa na yang / /dbyar zla 'bring po'i tha ma ni/ /lo yi nyi ma gzung bar bya/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ /skyon med sngags kyis sbyin byas nas/ /de yis dus rnams thams cad du/ /dpal dang phun tshogs mdun na gnas/ /rnal 'byor chos sogs la dga' bas/ /gnyis med grogs mchog rab ldan pas/ /de yis chos la brten nas ni/ /mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya/ /stong nyid kyis ni gzugs 'jig cing / /blangs pa'i chos rnams zad par byed/ /thams cad sdom pa nam mkha' ni/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam/ /thams cad nam mkha'i gnas su ni/ /'o ma zla ba'i sa bon bsam/ /'od zer 'bar ba mang po ni/ /dkar dang kun+da zla ba'i mdog /A li'i sa bon mchog gtso bo/ /dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya/ /skad cig rnam par sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid ni/ /zhal gsum

489
080-245a phyag ni drug pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /steng du rdo rje cod pan dang / /sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la brgyan/ /rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang / /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /smad g.yogs glang chen pags pa dang / /mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol/ /mi yi yan lag lnga rus pa'i/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /skra yi rtse mo rab 'jam zhing / /me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ /dang po'i phyag na kha T+wA~M ga/ /gnyis pa na ni dgra sta bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /gnyis pa thod pa khrag gis bkang / /ral gri'i phyag ni steng du'o/ /rdo rje 'od zer dri ma med/ / sangs rgyas sprin ltar rab 'phro ba/ /sa yi dbus su rnam rol bar/ /dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya/ /'ug pa ce spyang seng ge dang / /stag mo phyogs su rnam par bsgom/ /bya rog ce spyang bya rgod dang / /tsa li ka yi mtshams su dgod/ /'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs mche ba gtsigs/ /ha hU~M rnam par 'jigs par byed/ /'di ltar mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang ma/ /bdag nyid sems kyis bsgom par bya/ /Rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dgod par bya/ /rnal 'byor pa yi bris sku sogs/ /de yi gnas su kun tu bsam/ /'dod dang grol ba'i go 'phang gnas/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i lha nyid yin/ /sbyor ba'i sgo nas sgrub pa pos/ /'di yi mchod pa'i cho ga bshad/ /bza' dang ston mo de nyid dang / /gsang ba'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems kyis hU~M gi sa bon las/ /de yi gzugs la sogs bskyed pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dgod/ /bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/ /dag pa'i dngos por

490
080-245b bsgoms nas ni/ /bsgrub pa shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /yud tsam gyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /o~M ha ho hrIHswA hA/ oM gyis 'bar bar bsam pa dang / /ha yi rnam pas so sor rtogs/ /sa bon ho yis snang par byas/ /hrIHyi rnam pas dri ma sbyong / / lus kyi lha nyid tshim pa'i phyir/ /a yi rnam par rtogs par bya/ /sa bon lnga yis lha nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga nyid mngon par thim/ /o~M dza~M g+h+ra~M trA~M hU~M a swA hA/ bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid/ /sngags 'di yis ni gzung bar bya/ /oM gyis rnam pas lus dang ni/ /dza~M gyis rnam pas gzung ba dang / /g+h+ra~M gyis rnam par lto ba dang / /trA~M gis rnam par dri med lus/ /hU~M gis rnam pas spyad par bye/ /sems kyis snying gar yi ge a/ /de nyid rtag tu mchod byas na/ /rnal 'byor pa yis sdig sbyang bya/ / dri dang mar me me tog dang / /lha bshos dang ni gtor ma yis/ /glu yi dus su dbyangs snyan dang / /pi wang gling bu la sogs sbyar/ /rtag tu de dag gis mchod cing / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid brjod/ /'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang / /'chag dang thams cad dus nyid du/ /rtag tu sems shing sems pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsam par bya/ /oM a mu hU~M swA hA/ ye shes gzugs brnyan sbyor ba yis/ /sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas na/ /sdig pa thams cad thag bsrings shing / /rang 'dod las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i sdig /gang gis gsang ba dbye byas pa'ang / /rtag tu bsgom zhing bzlas byas na/ /sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /oM ka ra ka ra pra dz+r+wA ma hA tIk+Sh+Na pany+tsa oM bud+d+he ha/ oM kro d+ha hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a a a mu mu mu swA hA/ sngags chen po yi sa bon 'di/ /sangs rgyas sems ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /skyon med sbyor ba'i sgrub pa pos/ /thams cad ldan pa'i sa bon ni/ /mtshan mo yi ni mtha' nyid dang / /dang por ro hi ta dus la/ /nya phyis snod du chu

491
080-246a dang ni/ /ma gad+hA ni srang gnyis nyid/ /kun nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /bdud rtsi'i dbus su yang dag ldan/ /bdud rtsi bsam pa'i thabs kyis ni/ /shin tu mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas pa'i/ /de yi chu ni btung byas ni/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jig pa dang / /ye shes bdud rtsi ye shes sku/ /yid gzhungs shes rab rno ba dang / /rlung dang gzi brjid dpal 'phel zhing / /kun nas skal ldan dag dang ni/ /thos dang shes rab nor dang ni/ /rlung mkhris dug dang bad kan dang / /'dus dang glo sogs kyis gzer dang / /mig dang yan lag gzer ba ni/ /chu 'di yis ni nad kun 'grog /o~M ra ta a brta ni/ sarba phA pha~M ha ran+tu ma~M hU~M/ bi kr-i ta kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngags chen po/ /bsrung ba kun gyi bla na med/ /sngon gyi dus su gzhag byas nas/ /rnal 'byor lus ni bsrung ba'o/ /lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la/ /gnas lnga ru ni lan gsum mo/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni mngon bsam nas/ /spyi bo'i steng du bskur byas nas/ /rgyal po seng ge dgra sogs dang / /rkun mo dang ni me dang chu/ /rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs nad/ /'jigs byed 'jigs pa 'joms par byed/ /o~M bi mo ha ni sa~M mo ha ni/ sarba pri ye ti hU~M hU~M hU~M swA hA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngags chen pos/ /'gro kun rmongs par byed pa gsungs/ /mi byams byams pa skye byed cing / /kun nas mdza' bar gyur pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa yi ni chus/ /snga dro'i dus su kha bkrus na/ /rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod pa/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sbyor ba mchog tu bshad/ /snying po las ni snying po mchog /rdo rje la sogs bsgom par bya/ /gnyis su med par mnyam par 'dres/ /yan lag 'di yis tha dad bsgom/ /dug med pa yang dug gis bsnun/ /shin tu mi bzad

492
080-246b rmongs pa yis/ /rmongs pa rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jigs/ /'bad pas chos kyi thabs kyis ni/ /dag pa'i lus ni rnam dag byed/ /dag pa'i sgron ma bltas pa yis/ /nyon mongs la sogs mun pa 'joms/ /nam mkha' rdo rje rdo rje la/ /sems dang sems ni rnam par thim/ /gcig sogs dngos po bsgom pa ni/ /'di yi rnal 'byor mtshan nyid do/ /me yi lhag ma sogs lhags pa/ /dbus dang dbus su rnam par 'tsher/ /de yi 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams/ /shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas blta/ /sa bon 'di yi myu gu las/ /A li kA li rnam par 'byung / /sa bon sa bon rab 'phro ba/ /nam mkha'i khams su yang dag gnas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /ro langs ma yi dbus su bsam/ /pad+ma'i gdan la rnam par bzhugs/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa/ /lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang / /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sgeg pa'i nyams kyis blta ba dang / /na bza' dmar po mngon par g.yogs/ /mchog gi sems dang sems pa la/ /bdud rtsi'i yi ge rnam par bsam/ /lcags kyu'i rtse mor yi ge k+Shu~M/ /bzlas shing 'di yis drang par bya/ /gzugs brnyan gyis ni yid bskyod cing / /rang gi dbugs kyis dga' bar bya/ /o~M rA ga ta rA ga ta b+ha ti hU~M k+Shu~M swA hA/ lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'dod bzhin drang / /rmongs chen shin tu rmongs pa ni/ /mnyam par gzhag nas rab tu bsgrub/ /gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni/ / sbyor ba'i gdan gyi gsum pa las/ /grub pa'i snying po bsdus pa ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bsdus pa'o/ /de nas ye shes lus la ni/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /bza' dang bza' ba'i bsam pa yis/ /sbyang dang rtogs par spyad par

493
080-247a bya/ /dngos por smad pa ma yin zhing / /gang yang brtag par mi bya'o/ /mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs la sogs/ /mnyam nyid lha ni lnga pa'o/ /gang zhig skye ba po sogs pa/ /sems kyis gnod par mi bya'o/ /gal te gnod pa byed sems na/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig che dang phra ba yi/ /gzhan rdzas rang gir byed pa yis/ /rku ba'i sems ni mi bya'o/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring pa nyid/ /brdzun dang tshig rtsub phra ma dang / /'khyal ba'i dag ni ring du spang / / gzhan gyi sems la gnod byas pas/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/ /don dang ling ga rab sbyor bas/ /sbyor ba'i chos kyi snying po nyid/ /rmongs pas log dkris ngag sogs kyis/ /de yi rab sbyar smad pa nyid/ /legs par byas pa'i las kyis ni/ / bde ba bskyed pa'i lus kyis ni/ /sems can bde ba lhur len pas/ /theg pa che la legs par bslabs/ /gal te sems can gnod sogs pa'i/ /mi dga' ba yi tshig mi smra/ /sdig pa'i las ni mi bya zhing / /rnal 'byor gtsug lag mi smad do/ / rnal 'byor 'dod dga' ma yin zhing / /rmongs pas rgyags par mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya 'ching bar rab sbyor bas/ /rang 'dod kyis ni bsten par bya/ /bsten cing bsten pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /lha nyid tshim zhing bsgrub par bya/ /sems can don gyi ngo bo yis/ / sems can bde bas phan 'dogs byed/ /theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu che/ /'di yis lam gyis bsten par bya/ /gang dang gang du rab sbyor bas/ /de dang der ni phan pas bde/ /sems can sdom pa la sogs pas/ /de yi sems ni gnod mi bya/ / 'khor bar skyes pa'i dus na ni/ /thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan/ /dngos po dngos med byed pa dang / /sems can don ni A lir sgyur/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgya/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba bcings pa yis/ /de yi dbus su bdud rtsi ni/ /skye

494
080-247b zhing myu gu 'byung ba'o/ /'dab ma gsum dang kun ldan pa'i/ /A li mchog ni mtha' med do/ /gzhan yang bdud rtsi mchog nyid ni/ /phyi rol kun gyi snying po nyid/ /bdud rtsi yid 'ong skal ldan zhing / /sems can la ni snyan par stod/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi kun gyi lus/ /btso ma gser ltar 'bar ba'o/ /cod pan bcings shing 'phyar ba dang / /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /dgod dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /steng du rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /gnyis pa rdo rje zhags pa'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /gsum pa lcags sgrog 'ching ba yi/ /phyag bzhi bo yi phyag rgya ni/ /gsang ba gsang sogs 'ching ba dang / /lus dang kha dog 'bar ba ru/ /snang ba mtha' yas mnyam par gzhag /ha yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni/ /yi ge mchog gi dga' bar byed/ /ho yi rnam pas lus dang lus/ /rnam snang mnga' bdag lha nyid do/ /sems dang sems pa bsgoms pas ni/ /lha nyid du ni yongs su grags/ /thams cad lus dang lus can gyi/ /srog dang sems ni 'phrog pa'o/ /hrIHyi rnam pa'i sa bon ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /o~M gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'phro/ /kun nas sems ni rtogs mdzad pa'o/ /a yi rnam pa des tshim byed/ /blo dang ldan pas yongs su bsten/ /bdud rtsi chu yi lha mo ni/ / de yi shes bya rtogs pa'o/ /bdud rtsi gang gis myangs pa yis/ /bdud rtsi yi ni 'bras bu thob/ /de bzhin gshegs dgyes lha mo ni/ /gzugs mdzes mchog tu yid 'ong ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam pa yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi pa bcing bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa ni bslub 'dod na/ /gnyis ni gnyis su med par bsgom/ /gnyis ni dngos po dngos med pas/ /ye shes ldan pas yongs su gsal/ /nga rgyal chen pos bcings pa ni/ /spros pa'i sems dang ldan pas bcings/ /sgeg

495
080-248a dang khro ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /lha mo'i snying po nyid du thim/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/ /zla ba'i lag pas reg byas la/ /de yis 'khyud cing 'khyud nas ni/ /lha mo'i ye shes nyid du thim/ /lto ba'i ye shes me yi lha/ /de yi gnas su tshim par bya/ /shes rab thabs la thim pa yis/ /gnyis med sbyor bas tshim pa nyid/ /o~M ha ho hrIHa/ sa bon chen bo'i sa bon ni/ /'di yis sa bon bsam par bya/ /rim pa 'di yis mchod pa ni/ /sman gyi rgyur ni ma yin no/ /lha mo bkres dang sdug bsngal 'phrog /sgeg cing snyan par smra ba dang / /nga rgyal med pa'i nga rgyal byed/ /brtson med pa yi brtson 'grus bcas/ /kun nas skal ldan lha mos ni/ /rmongs byed 'jigs dang 'gugs par byed/ /yid mi gzhungs dang ngo tsha 'jigs/ /lha mo snyan mas 'joms par byed/ /de ltar yon tan lha mo ldan/ /yid 'ong bdud rtsi snyan pa mo/ /'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang gnas/ /gang zhig lha mo 'di yi lam/ /chu sbyar ne tso gtam dang ni/ /sgeg dang gar ni lnga ldan pa'o/ /lha min brtson 'grus bdun pa ste/ /dran pa nyams byed brgyad pa'o/ /lha mo pho nya brgyad kyi las/ /myur du sems ni 'phrog pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ba yi bdag nyid sems/ /'dod pa'i sems kyi rnam par byed/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ /'bad pas thang ka sna tshogs dgram/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par/ /kun nas pho nya brgyad pa ni/ /bud med gzugs su de yi tshul/ /phyogs kyi mdog dang mdog tu'o/ /gzugs mdzes yon tan ldan pa yi/ /dung chen la sogs lag pa na/ /gnas dang gnas la bdud rtsi'i chu/ /sha lnga yi ni snod la sogs/ /bza' dang ston mos nye bar mdzes/ /de yi gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /

496
080-248b me tog spos dang dri la sogs/ /gnyis med gtor mar yang dag ldan/ /dang por re zhig dam tshig gi/ /phyag rgya la sogs bcing bar bya/ /zla ba'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/ /rnam shes byed par kun tu ldan/ /oM hi li hi li hU~M phaT/ dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /mchod pa'i las la rab tu sbyar/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha ho hrIHa swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni/ /zla ba'i lag pa kun sbyar la/ /snying po'i snying dang phyag rgya yis/ /rang 'dod las ni rab tu byed/ /'bum phrag gcig zlos rnal 'byor pas/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /phyis ni me la sogs pa'i las/ /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis so/ /me thab kha ran gsum par ni/ /snang byed shing ni rab sbar la/ /lha mi'i me tog rgyas pa ni/ /sbrang rtsis bsku zhing sbyar byas la/ /bdud rtsi'i chu dang kun nas bsre/ /gang gi ming nas yang dag bzung / /brgyad brgya ru ni bsreg byas na/ /nges par dbang du 'gyur ba'o/ /me yi lha sogs thal ba dang / /bdag nyid khu ba lan lnga ru/ /bdud rtsi dbus su sbyin byas na/ /bdag nyid 'dod bzhin dbang du byed/ /smyo byed sbrul ni lnga pa dang / /u dza'i shing ni cha mnyam pa/ /bdud rtsir ldan par byin byas na/ /myur du smyo bar 'gyur ba'o/ /nim pa la sogs rtse mo la/ / mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /me tog bdug pa dri sogs dang / /gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni/ /arga dkar po'i rtsa ba las/ /'bad pas me ni rab tu sbrar/ /pad+mo zhib mo phye ma ni/ /'o ma dang ni bdud rtsis bsku/ /brgyad brgya ru bsreg byas pa yi/ /lhag ma'i thal ba bsgos pa'o/ /tsi tra ka yi rtsa ba'i chus/ /lan bdun bsgos la grib mar bskam/ /mchod pa'i dus rnal 'byor pas/ /de yi thal ba bdud rtsi chus/ /myur ba nyid du bsgos pa ni/ /kha ba kun+da 'o ma ru/ /lus

497
080-249a ni rmongs pa'i gzugs dang ni/ /shin tu rmongs shing rmongs pa'i dri/ /pho nya brgyad kyi lha mo ni/ /stobs dang gzi brjid don med pa'o/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa'i sems can la/ /'di yis las kyis rab tu sbyar/ /rmongs pa spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'gro ba myur du rtogs par 'gyur/ /'di yis phye ma blangs byas la/ /dzA ti mar khu lan gsum spang / /bdud rtsi mchod pa'i dus su ni/ /thal ba lhan cig bsres byas nas/ /thig le lce yis myangs pa yis/ /pho nya brgyad kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pho nya'i mtshan ma yongs rdzogs pa/ /smyo zhing rgyags shing rgyags pa'o/ /smyo byed shing ni yang dag blang / /'bad pas me ni rab sbar la/ /me tog sbrang rtsi bdud rtsir ldan/ /brgya brgya ru ni bsreg par bya/ /de yi thal ba blangs nas ni/ /rab tu sbyor ba la sogs bya/ /bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i gnas su ni/ /thal pa de yis byugs byas na/ /chu yis mdog ni gzhan du dang / /de yi ro ni gzhan du 'gyur/ /sbrang rtsi 'o mar ldan pa yis/ /de gzugs snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi thal ba blangs byas la/ /sku gsum pa yi cha dang bsre/ /bdud rtsi yi ni cha bdun dang / /ma ru tse yi cha brgyad nyid/ /mchod pa'i dus su chang la ni/ /de yi thal ba blugs byas na/ /gang la byin pa tsam gyis ni/ /bdud rtsi kun nas rang 'dod rig / gang dang gang gis lam gyis ni/ /de dang de yi rmongs pa rnams/ /sems can don du rmongs bsal phyir/ /rtag tu lam ni bstan par bya/ /gzhan gyi don la brtson par bya/ /rang gi 'dod 'di bsdus pa'o/ /sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang / /shes rab dman la sogs pas dman/ /gdan bzhi ba yi rgyud kyi ni/ /gsum pa gtor ma'i las kyi ni/ /dngos grub snying po btus pa ni/ /de yi dngos po bsdus pa'o/ /sngags sgrub pa yi don du ni/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /mchog

498
080-249b gi gzugs brnyan rab sbyar bas/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis rim pas bsgrub/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba ni/ /gzugs brnyan gyis ni thams cad 'grub/ /gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan par bya/ /sngon du ras kyi mtshan nyid dang / /gnyis pa ta la'i mtshan nyid dang / /gsum pa kha dog rim pa dang / /bzhi pa gtor ma sbyin sreg nyid/ /gleng gzhi rang 'dod bskyed nas ni/ /mnyams kha tshar yang dag ldan/ /steng 'og la sogs rab rgyas pa/ /ras la zhi ba'i ri mo bri/ /ma lhung ba yi yi dgas gos/ /ma nyams kha tshar bgo bar bya/ /tshon gyis ma phog cha la ni/ /rgyas pa yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /yi dgas mo yi dmar po'i ras/ /ma ltung bar ni rab tu spyad/ /tshon gyis ma phog rab sbyar ba/ /dbang nyid du ni yongs su grags/ /ra nag po yi pags pa dang / /ba lang rta sogs gzhan dag la/ /gnag cing drag sogs pa yi las/ /mngon spyod las kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de yi mnan pa'i gnas su ni/ /thig gi mtshan nyid gdab par bya/ /cha gsum du ni rab tu bsgo/ /gcig ni 'og tu dor bar bya/ /cha gnyis lnga pa'i steng du'o/ /gsum pa gsungs pa'i thig nyid ni/ /tshangs pa'i ri mo dbyug pa ni/ /cha lnga pa ni bdun du'o/ /lus ni cha gsum nyid du 'dod/ /zhi dang yan lag mnyam pa'o/ / zhal ni bcu gnyis cha nyid do/ /mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o/ /mgo dang skra la'ang de nyid do/ /rna ba nyid kyang de yi tshad/ /zhal gyi cha ni gsum pa nyid/ /dpral ba lkog ma sna nyid do/ /smin ma'i mtha' ni rna ba'i ltag /mig ni sor gnyis pa yi tshad/ / bug pa sor mo bzhi pa'o/ /de ni mig gi mtshan nyid do/ /mgrin pa'i mtha' yi dbus su ni/ /brang gi cha ni gnyis kyis mnan/ /snying ga'i gnas dang lte bar ni/ /mnan cing kun tu mnan pa'o/ /nu ma'i mthar ni mnan bcas pa/ /brang du nu ma

499
080-250a gnyis mnan la/ /lag pa gnyis kas mnan pa ni/ /lag gnyis kun tu gnon pa'o/ /sor bzhi pa dang ldan pa ni/ /brla dang rje dar kun tu ldan/ /bus mo gnyis la sor bzhi'o/ /rkang pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin no/ /bcu gnyis ta la'i tshad kyi ni/ /lha yi gzugs ni ri mor bri/ /lhag pa'i sor mo bzhi po ni/ /lha brgyad kyi ni gdan du'o/ /dgu pa yi ni gdan nyid ni/ /sor mo gnyis su bshad pa'o/ /dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun nas na bza'i 'od zer sogs/ /rab zab rdo rje'i lha nyid ni/ /ta la bcu gnyis kyi ni tshad/ /'og ma'i cha dang cha sogs dang / /nye bar mdzes sogs ri mo bri/ /steng gi lhag pa'i cha la ni/ /rigs ni lnga pa bstan pa'o/ /las kyi mdog sogs mdog tu ni/ /'dod bzhin lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba ni/ /bcu gnyis ta la'i rnam pa'o/ /de yi ta la'i tshad la ni/ /phyag gnyis kun nas bkug pa ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni rab dor la/ /zhi ba'i lha yi rnam pa'o/ /de yi ta las zhal bzhin bya/ /gsus khyim che zhing che ba nyid/ /kun nas tshigs dang tshigs nyid ni/ /sor mo gnyis ni dor bar bya/ /khro bo khro mo dbang phyug ma/ /bran pho bran mo mngag gzhug ni/ /drag po 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs/ /ta la bcur ni bri ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub par 'dod pa yis/ /mchod pa'i lha mo mngon par ldan/ /ras kyi brgyad kyi cha nyid ni/ /ta la'i steng du dor bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rim pa ni/ /rim dang rim bzhin sbyar bar bya/ /dbus su mnga' bdag rdo rje'i lha/ /gcig ba'i mtshan nyid rnam par bri/ /mgrin pa ko sko zhabs nyid ni/ /de gsum ring na nyes skyon no/ /sngags pa nges par bdag nyid ni/ /skrod dang gnas ni brlag pa'o/ /shangs dang snyan dang sor mo ni/ /de gsum thung ba'i nyes pa ni/ /nges par dngos

500
080-250b grub brlag pa dang / /de yi dpal yang ring ba nyid/ /rje ngaRa zhabs dang mkhur tshos ni/ /de gsum sbom pa nyes pa che/ /nges par sgrub po'i bdag nyid ni/ /bdud dang bgegs dang dpal ring ngo / /'gram pa brang dang rtsib logs ni/ /de gsum dma' na skyon che'o/ /yun mi ring ba myur du ni/ /nor ni brlag par 'gyur ba'o/ /nu ma rna ba dpral ba ni/ /de gsum yo na skyon che'o/ /'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tshe bar/ /myur du sgrub po 'gyur ba'o/ /brang dang lus dang brla gnyis ni/ /de gsum dma' na skyon che'o/ /dgras ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / /'chi bar yang ni the tshom med/ /sna zhom mig ni yo ba dang / /rna ba mchu dang dp+wal ba ni/ /bgegs dang bdud dang mes 'jigs shing / /dngos grub ring bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /gyen du lta ba'i dbu dang ni/ /gdan ni yo zhing tha dad pa/ /brang dang mgrin pa yan lag ni/ /nyes skyon grangs ni med par grags/ /'od zer yo zhing tha dad dang / /phyag rgya phyag mtshan nor bas ni/ /mya ngan gdung bas sdug bsngal bar/ /sgrub po'i gzugs brnyan nyes skyon no/ /rgyab yol gdugs dang ba dan ni/ /rnam gsum dog pa'i nyes pa ni/ /'chi zhing dpal nyams brlag pa dang / /mi mdza' mdza' ba 'joms pa'o/ /de ltar nyes skyon skyon chen pos/ /dul zhing dul la bzod pa dang / / sems ni shin tu mnyam gzha pas/ /rnam par brtag cing rab tu dpyod/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /mdzes pa'i tshul gyis mchod par bstan/ /sngags grub rgyu yi don dang ni/ /dbang dang dgug pa yi ni lha/ /zhi ba la ni zhi ba'i tshul/ /drag la drag cing 'jigs su rung / /dpa' zhing dpa' ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /dgod cing khro dang sgeg pa dang / /khro ba'i gzugs kyi tshul dang ni/ /bran dang bran mo'i rnam par sprul/ /las kyi gnas dang gnas nyid du/ /bdag nyid kyi ni

501
080-251a kha dog bsgyur/ /de ltar mtshan nyid mtshon pa yi/ /dngos grub myur du rdzogs pa dang / /rnal 'byor ba yi 'dod pa las/ /sngags pas thang ka'i ri mo bri/ /na maHsaman+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ sa~M bod+ha ni/ bi shud+d+ha/ na maHsarba b+hi ga ha re nam hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags pa yis ni sngags 'di yis/ /ras dang skud pa bkru ba'o/ /thams cad las kyis sngags kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs/ /gzugs brnyan so sor rab sbyor bas/ /sgrub pos thang ka bsgrub par bya/ /gzugs brnyan 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni/ /sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bya'o/ /yi dgas kyis ni gos blangs la/ /gtor ma la sogs ldan pa yi/ /nan tan gyis ni thang ka brgyad/ /thig sku dkyis ni ri mo bya/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /phyag gnyis pa la thang ka mdzes/ /rdo rje cod pan mthon ka'i rtse/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ / dar gyis dkri zhing rnam par 'phyang / /rdo rje phyag gis gsor mdzad cing / /snying gar gnon pa mchog tu brtson/ /g.yon par dril bu mngon ldan pas/ /rked pa'i mtshams su rnam par gnon/ /bco ma gser gyi kha dog dang / /sgeg cing shin tu bzhad pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor la brten par/ /khro bo'i 'od zer rnam par spro/ /dkar dang zla ba kun+da'i mdog /lha mo gsang ba'i snod mdzad cing / /rkang pas 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin par 'khyud/ / tshams kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /myos pas khro bo mchog gi ste/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa'i sku/ /chags pa'i gos dkar mnabs pa nyid/ /ba spu nas ni rdo rje 'phro/ /gdugs dkar po yis mngon g.yogs pa'i/ /'di ltar rdo

502
080-251b rje dbang phyug rgyal/ /pad+ma'i lus can rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje shar gyi cha ru ni/ /mo gzugs ri mor bris pa ni/ /gzugs kun la sogs rab rgyas pa'o/ /gnod sbyin mo ni rgyal dbang 'di/ /rin chen gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /phyag na gtor ma'i snod sogs pa/ /phyogs kyi mdog tu btso bar bya/ /dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/ /lus ngan gyi ni sring mo'o/ /phyag 'tshal tshul gyis 'dud pa ni/ /lha mo bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rdo rje byang gi cha la ni/ / lha mo snyan par smra ba ni/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/ /pad+ma'i lus can ye shes 'dzin/ /snyan pa'i gser btso ma yi mdog /bzang po'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gnyis kyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i snod/ / sgeg pa'i nyams kyi lta ba ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bri bar bya/ /ye shes nub kyi cha la ni/ /lha mo snyan pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog dang ni/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa'i/ / lha mo gzhon nu grub pa ni/ /lcags kyu lnga sogs snod kyis ni/ /gnyis pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje lho yi cha ru ni/ /'byung mo'i ming ni ska rags can/ /sku mdog sngon mo gzugs mdzes pa'i/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /bdud rtsi'i bum pa phyag gnyis na/ /gzhan gyi sgeg pa'i yan lag dang / /gshin rje yi ni sring mo nyid/ /dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni/ /thams cad kun la gzugs mdzes par/ /rnam par brtags te ri mo bri/ /rdo rje dril sogs rim par yang / / dbang ldan la sogs rim par sbyar/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /phyag ni phyag rgya mtshan ma sogs/ /de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal/ /rol pa'i 'khor lo bsam par bya/ /lha rnams dmigs pa dang bcas pa/ /sngags dang phyag rgya

503
080-252a gtor mas mchod/ /o~M sarba sid+d+hi ku ru hU~M/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so/ /o~M badzra hU~M phaT/ nyi ma'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/ /ye shes kyi ni pad+ma mnan/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ / yan lag drug tu bsrung bar bya/ /ye shes khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /dkar po dang nis gdugs bsgreng / /'khyil ba ras gdugs 'khyud byas la/ /dkar po'i lcags kyus spyan drang ngo / /o~M badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ phyag rgya de gnyis brtan bcings la/ /dkar bo dang ni gi wang sbrel/ /zhags ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya yis/ /kun nas lha mo bzhugs par ldan/ /o~M badzra pA sha hU~M/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /gsang zhing gsang ba'i lcags sgrog gis/ /lha rnams kun nas mnyes par bya/ /khu tshur de nyid dam bcings nas/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu yang dag ldan/ /sa gdugs pad+ma sprel byas la/ /kun nas lha nyid tshim byed pa'o/ /spos kyi phyag gnyis rab ldan pas/ /sor mo gnyis ka bsgreng byas la/ /zla ba nyi mar bzhugs byas la/ /snying rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM su ra ta badzra hU~M dza/ khu tshur gnyis ni bcings byas la/ /nyi ma'i steng du kha sbyar la/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /o~M shri ye ba ti hU~M phu swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings te/ /ye shes dang ni rnam shes bsgreng / /oM su kri ye hU~M phu swA hA/ byang gi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /dkar po dang ni gi wang bsgreng / / oM su ru su ru ma dur hU~M phu swA hA/ nub kyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas/ /sa gdugs pad+ma'i kha sbyin bya/ /oM pri ya~M me khA la hU~M phu swA hA/ lho phyogs lha mo rgyal dbang gis/ /snying po

504
080-252b sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /gnyis med cho ga'i sngags kyis ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /bdug pa me tog sogs glu dang / /mkhas pas mchod pa nyi shus mchod/ /'dod dang thar pa dge ba'i gnas/ /las rnams thams cad grub byed pa/ / rdo rje chos kyi bde spro ba/ /rnal 'byor sngags kyis sgrub par byed/ /de nas kun gyi snying po ni/ /khro bo gnod byed khro mo ni/ /dbye ba rnam gsum sku rang bzhin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag bzhi/ /khros pa'i khro bo'i mchog tu spro/ / 'jigs pa theg pa rnam pa gsum/ /lha mo'i lta bas 'jigs par byed/ /bdud dang 'byung po gcod byed cing / /bdud dang gdug pa skems pa dang / /gnon cing yul nas skrod pa dang / /'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang bsgrub/ /tshangs pa mnan cing nyed pa dang / /tsa muN+Di ni drag pos 'gugs/ /'jigs byed kun nas bsgrubs pa yang / /mkhas pa yi ni bsgrub par bya/ /re zhig dang po bris pa'i sku/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin/ /bye ba bcu bzhi'i tshogs dang ni/ / sna tshogs gzugs can bzhin ngan pa/ /lha mo dka' zlog gdan du ni/ /rgyab tu kun nas rnam par mnan/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sprul/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid/ /'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i zhal/ /rol pas 'phen pa'i gdan la ni/ /tshangs pa'i mgo ni zhabs kyis mnan/ /spyan gsum khro la nga rgyal can/ /dmar zhing dmar ba'i spyan dang ldan/ /'khyil zhing rnam par gyes pa yi/ /dbu sgra dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /rus ba'i thod pa'i phreng ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mi bzad cod pan no/ /bgegs kyi mgo bo bsam pa yis/ /klu gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /shin tu rgod cing mche ba gtsigs/ /zhal gsum kha dog gsum pa'o/ /glang chen pags pa

505
080-253a bsnams pa'o/ /mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol/ /rgyan brgyad kyi ni gnas nyid du/ dkar zhing rab 'bar rus pa'o/ /sangs rgyas mgo bo'i phrang ba dang / /mche ba rno zhing sor mo 'bar/ /steng gi phyogs su mda' dang ni/ / gnyis pa la ni kha T+wA~M ga/ /gsum pas rdo rje gsor ba'o/ /g.yas pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /gnyis pa la ni thod pa'o/ /gsum pa gzhu dang kun nas ldan/ /rgan byad drag mo 'jigs su rung / /zhags pas bcings shing rnam par brgyan/ /drag mo mnan cing mche ba gtsigs/ /khrag 'dzag pa dang brgyal ba ni/ /so sor dbus su brgyan pa yi/ /so so'i pho na rab tu bsgrub/ /tshon bdun gyis ni gos pa yi/ /rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu spro/ /khro bo mche ba gtsigs pa'i lus/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer rdo rje can/ /mi yi keng rus keng rus dang / /gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs/ /ye shes khro bo dbang phyug bdag /drag cing shin tu drag pa 'dul/ /bdud rnams thams cad gnon mdzad pa/ /shin tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams/ /zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo'i gzugs la sogs pa bstan/ /khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang / /ce sbyang srin po khyi la sogs/ /'jigs pa'i ku cho rab sgrogs dang / /mi yi keng rus gyis bkang ba'i/ /de ltar gzugs brnyan rab sbyor bas/ /'dod dang thar pa don gnyer dang / /thams cad khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa'i/ /sngags pas gzugs brnyan bsgrub par bya/ /o~M ta hU~M ma tha ma tha du Sh+DA na g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ ba dan gsum sogs phyag rgya yis/ /las rnams kun nas rab tu byed/ /spos dang bdug pa la sogs dri/ /rgyas pa'i mchod pa kun ldan pas/ /dpa' bo mchod sogs yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong ba yis/ /

506
080-253b cho ga'i yan lag sbyin sreg las/ /gtor ma'i las ni khyad par nyid/ /ma brtags pa yi sha dang ni/ /khrag gis kyang ni de nyid las/ /gang gang dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /de yi rnam pas tshim par bya/ /o~M bi trit+ti nA ma ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ zla ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni/ /rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/ /dkar po gi wang sbrel byas nas/ /sa yi gdugs dang pad+ma sbrel/ /de nyid snying po phyag rgya dang / /sngags de nyid ni rnam par sbyar/ /phur bu ra ba tsham ngam dang / /dra ba ge cha mtshon cha rnams/ / las kyi gnas su dgod pa ni/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu grags/ /phyag rgya 'di nyid snying gar bcing / /ye shes dang ni rnam shes sbyar/ /o~M kro d+ha ni hU~M a/ snying po mchog gi sa bon dang / /phyag rgya de nyid rnam par bya/ /lus dang srog la ltos med par/ /chen po'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /drag cing rno ba'i lha mo ni/ /rno ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya/ /cung zad zhi ba'i lha mo ni/ /thabs cig gis ni mtshan nyid do/ /chu yi 'gram gyi sa phyogs su/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /'bum phrag lnga ni bzlas pa dang / /phyis ni 'bum phrag gcig gis so/ /zhi ba'i mchod pa phul nas ni/ /me yi las la sogs pa bya/ /nag por yi sha dang ni/ /khrag dang rnam par bsres nas ni/ /bris sku la sogs gzugs brnyan mdun/ /rdzogs pa'i cho gas sbyin sreg bya/ gtor ma sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/ /thams cad las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag dang / /mngon par spyod pa la sogs 'grub/ /dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yis/ /bum pa rgya cher mchod pa yis/ /nad kyi yan lag gzir ba la/ /sngon du dbang bskur byin byas nas/ /nad kun dang ni bral ba dang / /de bzhin gza' yis gnod pa nyid/ /skal ba dman dang mi byams pas/ /thams cad zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /ser po'i

507
080-254a tshon dang spra tshil las/ /log 'dren lha yi gzugs brnyan nyid/ /mnyam pa'i gdan la thal mo sbyar/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras/ /mche ba gtsigs pa yan lag rgyas/ /pad+ma'i snod la gnas pa ni/ /rtse gsum dang ni bza' ba'i snod/ /dgra sta la phug phyag na'o/ /sor mo bzhi yi tshad du ni/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /bris sku'i gzugs brnyan mdun du ni/ /'khrul 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya/ /groga'am ni shing shun la/ /gi wang dang ni gur gum gyis/ /sgrub pa po yi gzugs brnyan bri/ /gzugs dang rnam pa kun ldan pa/ /snying gar ming ni bri bar bya/ /g.yo dang lhung dang srog 'dren pa/ /lcags kyu kun nas ldan pa dang / /dpral bar drangs nas gzhag par bya/ /bgegs kyi dbang pa yi ni gdan/ /snying gar mnan nas gzhag par bya/ /me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod/ /nan tan gyis ni gtor ma'i las/ /don 'dod 'bras bu don gnyer ba'i/ /rnal 'byor pas ni sngags yig bzlas/ /o~M tra~M tha tha tha hU~M dza swA hA/ me tog dkar po la bzlas shing / /re re zhing ni brdeg par bya/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs rdzogs na/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /sngags 'di yis ni sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub pa po yi yid g.yo zhing / /myur du 'gugs shing yon pa'o/ /rgyal po'i dbang po dbang phyug sogs/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal tshab dang / /phyug po'i byis pa la sogs dang / /shin tu mdzes pa'i bdag nyid lus/ /sha tsi dang ni brgya byin sogs/ /gal te kun nas 'dod tsam gyis/ / sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur/ /ji srid lus ni 'tsho ba'i bar/ /dus rtag tu ni rnam par 'dud/ /nga rgyal yan lag gtso bo bas/ /nga rgyal gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /khro bo'i lus ni bstan pa yis/ /las dang las ni myur du 'grub/ /khro bo'i

508
080-254b lus rnam par bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //spyod pa'i chos can kun bsdus pa/ /brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bstan pa'o/ /ye shes longs spyod 'bras 'dod pas/ /spyod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /mi bzad 'khor ba 'jigs pa ni/ / chags pas srid par ltung ba'o/ /chags pa spangs pa'i lus kyi ni/ /rgyun du brtul zhugs yang bzung ngo / /dben par shin tu mnyam gzhag pas/ /dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa'o/ /chags pas srid par ltung ba dang / /zhen pas 'khor bar 'jug par byed/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ring du spangs/ /sems can don du chos bstan phyir/ /sems can don byed gyur pas kyang / /brtul zhugs dka' thub mi bzad pas/ /dben par sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /chags pa'i nyes pa rgya mtshor 'khor/ /bdag nyid nyon mongs las rgyal phyir/ /sems can don blo 'ba' zhig go/ /sems can don 'gyur dus su ni/ /spyod dang sdom pa'i ston bzhin no/ /'du 'dzi dang bral dben pa ni/ /dga' ba ru ni lus bsrung ngo / /dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas/ /bstan bcos tshig rnams blangs byas nas/ /sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ /rab tu rno bas chos spyad do/ /gnas dang gnas la'ang mi gnas pa'i/ /nam du yang ni mi gzung ngo / /bza' dang bza' min par rtog pa'i/ /dman sogs nges par mi bya'o/ /'bad pas rtag tu dga' ba yis/ /lha ma mkhan nya pa shan pa dang / /bram ze dmangs rigs rgyal rigs rnams/ /mnyam pa'i sems kyi lam gyis ni/ /rtag tu slong mo bslang bar bya/ /gal te gong du spyod pa'i tshe/ / gang zhig bza' ston zos pa dang / /mal cha ras dang mchil lham yang / /longs spyod longs spyod yid 'ong ba'i/ /brtul zhugs la gnas tsam gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid/ /spyod pa spyod dgur rnal 'byor pas/ /bsod nams

509
080-255a lag tu blang bar bya/ /thams cad bslangs kyang nyes med de/ /dngos po yang ni mi gzung ngo / /sems ni rnam par dag pa yis/ /thams cad bza' zhing bza' ba nyid/ /dag cing gus bcas nga rgyal gyis/ /de yi gnas ni yongs su spangs/ /dad pas dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / /yang na gtor ma'i las la ni/ /bsags pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po ni/ /de yi gnas su dbul bar bya/ /chos gos gsum gyi lhag ma ni/ /slar yang gus pa yis ni gzung / /spyi bor ngur smrig mtshan ma dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang / /rnying pa'i tshem ber chos gos gsum/ /steng du rdo rje dbyug pa dang / /lhung bzed mchan khung chu tshags bcas/ /de ltar 'dzin pa'i lus la ni/ /glegs bam la sogs gzhan yang med/ /grog mo la sogs bsal ba'i phyir/ /rnga ma'i chun po bsngags pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag dang / /chos don rtsa pa snying rje nyid/ /de nas bslab par bya ba ni/ /bla ma'i tshig gi sdom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rdzu 'phrul che/ /mchog la skyabs dang skyabs su mchi/ /rdo rje dbang phyug mchog gi lus/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal/ /lha mo shes rab sbyor rang bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro lnga la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M a mu ka sa ma yo ha~M sa ma ya/ a mu ka sa ma yo/ o~M a mu ka sa ma yo/ ha~M sa ma ya/ o~M badzra badzra/ ma hA badzra badzra/ kA ya su par/ hi hi hi/ ho ho ho/ hU~M na ni ba ta da~M/ 'di yis slob ma rab tu gzung / /brtul zhugs rdo rje rdo rje can/ /gnyis pa'i las kyis bsgrub par bya/ /sbyor dang gsang ba'i sngags rig pas/ /thams cad dus dang dus nyid du/ /tshigs bcad gnyis ni brjod par bya/ /gang zhig pha dang gang zhig ma/ /gang zhig mdza' ba'ang mi rtag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas lus ni sgya ma nyid/ /rtag tu

510
